00041 using namespace OSL;
00042 
00049 class GenericBackgroundClosure : public BackgroundClosure {
00050 public:
00051     GenericBackgroundClosure() { }
00052 
00053     void setup() {};
00054 
00055     size_t memsize () const { return sizeof(*this); }
00056 
00057     const char *name () const { return "background"; }
00058 
00059     void print_on (std::ostream &out) const {
00060         out << name() << " ()";
00061     }
00062 
00063 };
00064 
00065 
00073 class HoldoutClosure : ClosurePrimitive {
00074 public:
00075     HoldoutClosure () : ClosurePrimitive (Holdout) { }
00076 
00077     void setup() {};
00078 
00079     size_t memsize () const { return sizeof(*this); }
00080 
00081     const char *name () const { return "holdout"; }
00082 
00083     void print_on (std::ostream &out) const {
00084         out << name() << " ()";
00085     }
00086 };

00088 ClosureParam closure_background_params[] = {
00089     CLOSURE_STRING_KEYPARAM("label"),
00090     CLOSURE_FINISH_PARAM(GenericBackgroundClosure) };
00091 
00092 CLOSURE_PREPARE(closure_background_prepare, GenericBackgroundClosure)
